fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We follow especially topics around energy like the so called "Winter package" and ETS, the Circular Economy Package and trade issues like Free Trade Agreements and Anti-dumping measures as well as envioronmental legislation.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: High level steering group of the European Innovation Partnership on Raw Materials #E03391#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3391#Member#C#EIP Sherpa group
membership: Aurubis is an active member of various trade organizations on European level, among others: Eurométaux, European Copper Institute, International Copper Association, BDI - the German Business Association, VCI.
goals__remit:
Aurubis is the leading integrated copper group and the world's largest copper recycler. 
Sustainable development is an essential part of its corporate strategy. 
Our products are linked to the ever increasing standard of living and make a significant and positive contribution to the EU climate change and resource efficiency policies.
